de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.adapter

Class AbstractImAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.adapter.AbstractImAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImcAdapterIetf, ImvAdapterIetf

    public abstract class AbstractImAdapter
extends Object
    Generic IM(C/V) adapter base, providing common functions for derived adapters. Especially important for inheritance.
